metadata.title: CVE-2020-7692 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: PKCE support is not implemented in accordance with the RFC for OAuth 2.0for Native Apps. Without the use of PKCE, the authorization code returnedby an authorization server is not enough to guarantee that the client thatissued the initial authorization request is the one that will beauthorized. An attacker is able to obtain the authorization code using amalicious app on the client-side and use it to gain authorization to theprotected resource. This affects the packagecom.google.oauth-client:google-oauth-client before 1.31.0.

criterions.comment: google-oauth-client-java package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
